thread.title: adidas Skateboarding Announces New Zine With Renowned Photographer Ari Marcopoulos
thread.title_full: adidas Skateboarding Announces New Zine With Renowned Photographer Ari Marcopoulos

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: adidas Skateboarding Announces New Zine With Renowned Photographer Ari Marcopoulos
text:
adidas Skateboarding has joined forces with renowned photographer Ari Marcopoulos for an exclusive zine and limited edition footwear and apparel collection. The project draws inspiration from the artist’s signature documentary photography style, 90’s lo-fi zine publishing, and the creative spirit of New York City skate culture.
To coincide with today’s announcement, adidas Skateboarding unveils the visual for AIGHT . The aesthetic, featuring Ari Marcopoulos, adidas team riders Mark Gonzales, Tyshawn Jones, Nestor Judkins, Kevin Lowry, Frankie Spears, and friends skating the streets of New York, in turn brings the limited edition zine to life while combining artful behind-the-scenes footage and modern street skating.
You’ll have to check back with us for the reveal of the adidas x Ari Marcopoulos collection, slated for February 27.
